title: Gadget Review: Epomaker TH87 ISO Mechanical Keyboard ★★★★⯪
summary: If I'm being brutally honest, I never really got the appeal of mechanical keyboards. There was always someone in the office who made a godawful racket hammering on their keyboard and then waxed lyrical about the merits of various switches. I'd mostly just dismissed them as cranks.
